languages.text: "Давайте сначала проясним — сбои в работе устраивали вы? А странные записи в судовом журнале?"

traits.locale_text: "Давай сначала проясним — сбои в работе устраивал ты? А странные записи в судовом журнале?"

languages.text: "Let's start by clearing certain things up. Were you the one responsible for the ship's malfunctions? And what about the strange entries in the ship's log?"
languages.original_text: "Давайте сначала проясним — сбои в работе устраивали вы? А странные записи в судовом журнале?"

traits.locale_text: "Let's start by clearing certain things up. Were you the one responsible for the ship's malfunctions? And what about the strange entries in the ship's log?"
"Let's start by clearing certain things up. Were you the one responsible for the ship's malfunctions? And what about the strange entries in the ship's log?"
"Let's start by clearing certain things up. Were you the one responsible for the ship's malfunctions? And what about the strange entries in the ship's log?"
"Let's start by clearing certain things up. Were you the one responsible for the ship's malfunctions? And what about the strange entries in the ship's log?"
"Let's start by clearing certain things up. Were you the one responsible for the ship's malfunctions? And what about the strange entries in the ship's log?"

languages.text: 「まずいくつか確認していこう。船の機能がおかしくなっているのはお前のせいか？それから、船のログの奇妙な記録については？」
languages.original_text: "Let's start by clearing certain things up. Were you the one responsible for the ship's malfunctions? And what about the strange entries in the ship's log?"

traits.locale_text: 「まずいくつか確認していこう。船の機能がおかしくなっているのはお前のせいか？それから、船のログの奇妙な記録については？」

languages.text: “咱们先把事情说清楚吧。舰船的故障是你造成的吗？舰船日志上的那些古怪的记录又是怎么回事？”
languages.original_text: "Let's start by clearing certain things up. Were you the one responsible for the ship's malfunctions? And what about the strange entries in the ship's log?"

traits.locale_text: “咱们先把事情说清楚吧。舰船的故障是你造成的吗？舰船日志上的那些古怪的记录又是怎么回事？”

languages.text: "Klären wir erst einmal einige Dinge. Wart Ihr für die Fehlfunktionen des Schiffs zuständig? Und was ist mit den merkwürdigen Einträgen im Log des Schiffs?"
languages.original_text: "Let's start by clearing certain things up. Were you the one responsible for the ship's malfunctions? And what about the strange entries in the ship's log?"

traits.locale_text: "Klären wir erst einmal einige Dinge. Wart Ihr für die Fehlfunktionen des Schiffs zuständig? Und was ist mit den merkwürdigen Einträgen im Log des Schiffs?"

languages.text: « Commençons par clarifier certaines choses. Êtes-vous responsable des dysfonctionnements du vaisseau ? Et qu'en est-il des messages étranges dans le journal de bord ? »
languages.original_text: "Let's start by clearing certain things up. Were you the one responsible for the ship's malfunctions? And what about the strange entries in the ship's log?"

traits.locale_text: « Commençons par clarifier certaines choses. Êtes-vous responsable des dysfonctionnements du vaisseau ? Et qu'en est-il des messages étranges dans le journal de bord ? »

languages.text: «Empecemos aclarando ciertas cosas. ¿Has sido tú el responsable de todos los fallos que hemos tenido en la nave? ¿Y qué me dices de las extrañas entradas en el cuaderno de bitácora?».
languages.original_text: "Let's start by clearing certain things up. Were you the one responsible for the ship's malfunctions? And what about the strange entries in the ship's log?"

traits.locale_text: «Empecemos aclarando ciertas cosas. ¿Has sido tú el responsable de todos los fallos que hemos tenido en la nave? ¿Y qué me dices de las extrañas entradas en el cuaderno de bitácora?».

languages.text: "Bir şeyleri açıklığa kavuşturarak başlasak iyi olur. Gemideki arızaların sorumlusu sen miydin? Ayrıca gemi kayıtlarındaki tuhaf girdiler de senin marifetin miydi?"
languages.original_text: "Let's start by clearing certain things up. Were you the one responsible for the ship's malfunctions? And what about the strange entries in the ship's log?"

traits.locale_text: "Bir şeyleri açıklığa kavuşturarak başlasak iyi olur. Gemideki arızaların sorumlusu sen miydin? Ayrıca gemi kayıtlarındaki tuhaf girdiler de senin marifetin miydi?"
